entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 24.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13.
